query.statement:
SELECT Z.CODE, Z.CODE_NAME FROM (SELECT LIFNR AS CODE,SUBSTR(NAME1,28) AS CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (NAME1 LIKE '%한국승강기안전공단%' AND LIFNR <> '4058203931')
UNION ALL
SELECT LIFNR AS CODE,NAME1 AS CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (LIFNR = '1138202014' OR LIFNR = '1148205178' OR LIFNR = '4058203931')
UNION ALL -- 이전데이터 확인을 위한 기술원 + 관리원 추가 SELECT LIFNR AS CODE, NAME1 AS CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (SORTL LIKE '%이전_설치검사기관%' AND LIFNR <> '4058203931') ) AS Z ORDER BY Z.CODE_NAME
